pages.text: witchcraft utilizes several natural crops for the art. these crops are used for rituals, brewing and many other things.$(br2)seeds for these crops can be found in wild grass, much like other seeds.

the four regular crops are aconite, belladonna, garlic and mandrake.$(br2)aconite is mostly used as a neurotoxin, whereas belladonna is known for causing physical harm. mandrake enhances magic, and garlic embodies healing.
garlic can also be roasted into delicious grilled garlic.
grilled garlic can in turn be crafted into even more delicious garlic bread.
